languages.text: Вольный Торговец бросил{mf||а} надсмотрщиков Веабоса-6 в карьеры. Набрав новую администрацию из самих каторжан, Торговец смягчил{mf||а} условия и предоставил{mf||а} им новые возможности.

The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец бросил{mf||а} надсмотрщиков Веабоса-6 в карьеры. Набрав новую администрацию из самих каторжан, Торговец смягчил{mf||а} условия и предоставил{mf||а} им новые возможности.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a envoyé les superviseurs de Vhéabos-VI dans les carrières, puis en a recruté de nouveaux parmi les condamnés, ce qui lui a permis d'améliorer leurs conditions d'incarcération tout en leur offrant un certain contrôle.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a envoyé les superviseurs de Vhéabos-VI dans les carrières, puis en a recruté de nouveaux parmi les condamnés, ce qui lui a permis d'améliorer leurs conditions d'incarcération tout en leur offrant un certain contrôle.

languages.text: 自由開拓者はヴィアボス・VIの監督官たちを採石場に送り込んだ。自由開拓者は囚人たちから新たな監督官を雇い入れることで、囚人たちの獄中環境を改善し、ある程度の統制を確保した。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はヴィアボス・VIの監督官たちを採石場に送り込んだ。自由開拓者は囚人たちから新たな監督官を雇い入れることで、囚人たちの獄中環境を改善し、ある程度の統制を確保した。

languages.text: 行商浪人派遣维博斯六号星的监察员进入采石场，在犯人之中招募新的监察员。通过这样的手段，行商浪人改善了犯人的生活条件，赋予他们一定程度的自治权。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人派遣维博斯六号星的监察员进入采石场，在犯人之中招募新的监察员。通过这样的手段，行商浪人改善了犯人的生活条件，赋予他们一定程度的自治权。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente envió a los vigilantes de Vheabos VI a las canteras. Al reclutar a otros de entre las filas de los propios convictos, mejoró las condiciones de su prisión y les concedió cierto grado de control.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente envió a los vigilantes de Vheabos VI a las canteras. Al reclutar a otros de entre las filas de los propios convictos, mejoró las condiciones de su prisión y les concedió cierto grado de control.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} schickte die Aufseher von Vheabos-VI in die Steinbrüche. Indem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} neue Aufseher aus den Reihen der Sträflinge selbst rekrutierte, verbesserte {mf|er|sie} deren Haftbedingungen und gewährte ihnen ein gewisses Maß an Kontrolle.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} schickte die Aufseher von Vheabos-VI in die Steinbrüche. Indem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} neue Aufseher aus den Reihen der Sträflinge selbst rekrutierte, verbesserte {mf|er|sie} deren Haftbedingungen und gewährte ihnen ein gewisses Maß an Kontrolle.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Vheabos VI'nın gözetmenlerini ocaklara gönderdi. Hükümlülerin arasından yenilerini işe alarak hapishane koşullarını iyileştirdi ve onlara bir dereceye kadar serbestlik sağladı.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader sent the overseers of Vheabos VI into the quarries. By recruiting new ones from the ranks of the convicts themselves, the Rogue Trader ameliorated their prison conditions and granted them some degree of control.
